questions_and_notes: Should this be undefined where sea?  Should deprecate in favor of "where all_area_types".  Consider eliminating scalar dimension.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 0 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where land over all_area_types time: mean
long_name: Percentage Cover by Secondary Deciduous Trees
comment: Percentage of entire grid cell  that is covered by secondary deciduous trees.
